Color string_to_color ( std::string  color  ) 

Get a Color object from a given string name.

Parameters:
color The name of the color you want. Colors are indicated by strings. Most normal colors such as 'red', 'purple', 'green', 'cyan', etc. should be available. Many colors come in various shades, such as 'red1', 'red2','red3', 'red4', which are increasingly darker shades of red.
